original: Hañci taṇhā dukkhasamudayo vutto bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Nanu lobho dukkhasamudayo vutto bhagavatā, dhammataṇhā lobhoti?
Hañci lobho dukkhasamudayo vutto bhagavatā, dhammataṇhā lobho, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Hañci sā dhammataṇhā, tena vata re vattabbe—
Kappaṭṭho kappaṁ tiṭṭheyya, kappaṭṭho kusalaṁ cittaṁ na paṭilabheyya, anantarāpayutto
puggalo sammattaniyāmaṁ okkameyya, niyato niyāmaṁ okkamati, nivuto nīvaraṇaṁ jahati,
sammukhībhūto saṁyojanaṁ jahati, jhānanikanti, asātarāgo, dhammataṇhā abyākatā, dhammataṇhā
